H0.text: The town of Honiton in Devon is famous for producing what. Pottery

H1.text: The town of Honiton in Devon is famous for producing what. Wool

H2.text: The town of Honiton in Devon is famous for producing what. Cider

H3.text: The town of Honiton in Devon is famous for producing what. Lace

A4.text: Honiton lace is a type of bobbin lace made in Honiton, Devon, in the United Kingdom.

A5.text: Handmade lacework had a resurgence in popularity in the 19th century when Queen Victoria ordered a Honiton lace bridal dress.
